poem:
Watcher of Screens  

In the flickering caves  
of our modern solace,  
where the glow consoles  
the weary, besieged heart.  
Here, the fleeting shadows  
pull us gently from despair,  
whispering tales of love,  
laughter, and living—  
a balm for the soul  
when the world outside  
like a distant star fades.
